name: Spooktacular
description:
It’s Halloween Night, 1986. The all-night Spooktacular Film Festival is running in full swing. But a storm is coming. Lightning strikes, overloading the power, and releasing a hundred years of cinematic monsters from the silver screen.

As one of those monsters, YOU are now free to wreak havoc. Terrify and devour unsuspecting moviegoers in a race to become the most terrifying monster of all time!

Play as one of 20 unique movie monsters, each with their own way of playing the game.  Easy to understand rules are the base of the game, and everything else you need to know is right on your monster board.  Tons of replayability and so many devious monster abilities to discover will keep you coming back to the theater…
